title: Built to Spill spills the beans on the making of 'When The Wind Forgets Your Name'
description: In this session, Doug Martsch talks about how discovering a lo-fi punk band from Brazil led to the album's creation and shares advice he'd give to his younger self.
itunes:title: Built to Spill spills the beans on the making of 'When The Wind Forgets Your Name'
itunes:author: Stephen Kallao
itunes:summary: In this session, Doug Martsch talks about how discovering a lo-fi punk band from Brazil led to its creation and shares advice he'd give to his younger self.
